hero.inspirationCta: Sounds good? Check our Inspirations for {country}

summary.bioFallback: Add a short bio so others can understand your travel style.
summary.stampsDescription: Your latest achievements are collected as travel passport stamps.
summary.stampsEmpty: Create your first trip to unlock your first stamp.

publicProfile.title: Public profile
publicProfile.privateDescription: This traveler has hidden their public profile for now.
publicProfile.notFoundDescription: We could not find a profile for this handle.
publicProfile.followHint: Follow and message actions are coming soon.

settings.title: Profile settings
settings.description: Update your profile details, public URL, and visibility defaults.
settings.onboardingDescription: Before using TravelFlow, add your core profile details so personalization works reliably.
settings.usernameHelp: Lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only. 3-30 characters.
settings.usernameCooldownHint: You can change your username again on {date}.
settings.bioHelp: Share a short intro travelers can see on your public profile.
settings.publicProfileToggleDescription: Allow others to discover your public profile and visible trips.
settings.defaultVisibilityToggleDescription: Choose whether new trips are public on your profile by default.
settings.publicUrlEmpty: Set a username to generate your public profile URL.
settings.requiredHint: Complete all required fields to continue.

errors.usernameUnavailable: Choose an available username before saving.

usernameStatus.idle: Set your username to claim a public profile URL.
usernameStatus.invalid: Use 3-30 lowercase letters, numbers, or underscores.
usernameStatus.cooldown: Username changes are currently on cooldown.
usernameStatus.cooldownDate: Username changes are on cooldown until {date}.
usernameStatus.failed: Could not verify username availability right now.

stamps.title: Your travel passport
stamps.description: {name}, these stamps track your TravelFlow milestones and how rare they are across the community.
stamps.passportDescription: Last three unlocked stamps. Drag to position your sticker layout.
stamps.passportEmpty: No stamps yet. Create or save trips to unlock your first achievement.
stamps.selectHint: Select a stamp to view details and rarity.
stamps.empty: No stamps match this filter yet.

likedPlaceholder.title: Liked trips are coming soon
likedPlaceholder.description: You will soon be able to save and revisit trips from other travelers here.

empty.title: No trips in this section yet
empty.description: Create a trip or mark one as favorite to populate this view.

messages.pinEvicted: The oldest pinned trip was unpinned to keep your highlights at three.
